comment.author: 30085166@N00
comment._content: The 1913 May Day parades and rally in New York City were "...without incident of disorder," according to the article published by The Times the next day. The previous year, the rally had erupted into a riot.

comment.author: 8623220@N02
comment._content: Thanks!  We'll fix the date  in the source data and reload the description.
